attributes.comment:
It is ubsurd to increase the application fee for I-140 from $195 to $475, a 144%
increase; and the application fee for I-485 from $325 to $905, a 178% increase.

Any one who wish to join this country has been working hard to earn his/her
standing for whatever reason he or she may have. US government should
appreicate the efforts and show the respect to those had high perspective of US
goverment. By increasing the application fee at a rediculous amount is a sign of
irrespection of immigrants and a distort of way of increasing revenue.

I am totally against such increment as over 50% of orignial amount which is not
accetable. The attorney fee is skyrocking along with the increasing demand of
immigration petition. Please allow those who are struglling to merge into main
stream to have a decent life by not increase absurd amount of money for
application fee. Thank you!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ying Huang
